lexUnit.name: blizzard.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a severe snowstorm with high winds.

sentence.text: In a thrilling climactic scene during a howling blizzard in the mountains , he and Umegawa do kill themselves .
Fosters Tackle The 42 hardy anglers who braved the worst of Thursday 's blizzards found bites scarce on the Severn at Stourport .
